In environment P : Z -> Set H : forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n n : nat IHn : and_recZ n P n0 : nat H0 : n0 <= S n Unable to unify "and_recZ n P" with "and_recZ n0 P".

original: intros P H n. induction n. - unfold and_recZ. intros. apply Zrec2 with (P := P). auto. - unfold and_recZ. intros n0 H0. apply Zrec3 with (p := n0) (P := P). auto. apply IHn.
